creditline: Gift of Joel and Irene Njus in memory of Siri Ivar's datter Grosberg
markings: [S I D Z (?)/1 7 7 7], in red and white, inside each organic motif, on front
text: This chest was made to commemorate the marriage of the artist’s daughter Sirid to Ola Iverson Lo. Ornate feather-like patterns frame each of Sirid’s initials, SIDQ—for Sirid Ivar’s Datter Quallen (Kvalen)—and the date, 1777. A dowry chest such as this would have been filled with clothing, linens, and valuables. In 1858, Sirid’s descendants brought the chest with them when they emigrated from Norway to Wisconsin.
title: Chest
